description:
Collection of demonstration videos (mixture of live action footage and animation) of basic interesting scientific experiments.

This product is aimed at developing a liking and understanding at a fundamental level in children ● Basic principles of science. ● How things work in day today life. ● How they can develop more experiments with available material at home and around. ● We believe that activity to hand is the quickest way to develop intellect. ● We believe multiple experiences help in developing a Child's personality.

Students can enjoy the experiments and learn within 1 month.
title: The Magic in Science
